def_cn: 摩羯座，摩羯宫（黄道十二宫之一。出生于12月22日至1月19日之间的人属此星座）
def_en: Capricorn is one of the twelve signs of the zodiac. Its symbol is a goat. People who are born approximately between the 22nd of December and the 19th of January come under this sign.
A Capricorn is a person whose sign of the zodiac is Capricorn.
